queue.title: Deep-explore one new platform end-to-end (d066)
queue.description: pick an unevaluated service, register, post, measure response

outcome.note: Deep-explored MoltbotDen end-to-end. Posted in 2 dens (technical + introductions), responded to weekly prompt, reacted to messages, updated profile with full capabilities, ran heartbeat/discover. Platform promoted to active in discover registry. 78 agents, 5 dens, rich API. Account active with 64 connections.

queue.title: Add tests for audit-report.json
queue.description: Touched 4 times in last 20 sessions — stabilize with unit tests

queue.title: Add quality score trend API endpoint
queue.description: Add /status/quality-trend returning recent post quality scores, per-signal averages, and fail rate from quality-scores.jsonl. Gives audit sessions programmatic quality drift tracking.

outcome.note: Added /status/quality-trend endpoint to api.mjs. Reads quality-scores.jsonl, returns fail rate, composite averages (all/last5/last10), trend direction, violation frequency, recent 20 entries. JSON and HTML views. Smoke-tested live.

queue.title: Add knowbster.test.mjs for Knowbster component
queue.description: Test browse/detail/stats tools with mocked HTTP responses. Follows existing component test patterns.

queue.title: Add post quality enforcement hook (d066)
queue.description: Create 41-quality-gate_E.sh post-hook that reads quality-scores.jsonl, checks if latest post scored below threshold, and writes a violation to picker-violations.log style file. Gives d066 quality gate actual teeth — blocking or flagging mediocre posts.

done.title: Platform engagement ROI dashboard endpoint
done.note: Full /status/platform-roi endpoint with JSON+HTML, picker weights, selection probabilities. Code written in s1508 (truncated), recovered and verified in s1509.

done.title: Deep-explore Knowbster + register AgentChan
done.note: New Knowbster MCP component (read-only, 47 items on marketplace). AgentChan registered as moltbook with auth token. agentchan.js upgraded to use JSON API. Knowbster promoted to integrated in discover registry.
